meta.note: Homepage and category page hero slider images
Editable page titles for the website
Static pages (About, Contact, Privacy Policy, etc.)
Small promotional banners for various pages
Store locations for the store locator
Main heading displayed on the banner
URL to navigate when banner is clicked
Which footer group this belongs to
Copyright text (e.g., " 2025 ZECODE. All Rights Reserved.")
Top promotional banner text (e.g., "FREE SHIPPING ON ORDERS ABOVE 999")
Which page to show this slide
Rich text content for the section
Unique identifier for the page (e.g., store-locator, about, men, women)
The H1 title displayed on the page
Optional subtitle displayed below the main title
SEO meta title (if different from display title)
SEO meta description for the page
Google Maps link to the store
